      • getWorkingFileByFileName

        public File getWorkingFileByFileName(java.lang.String fileName,
                            Folder folder)
                              throws DotDataException
        This method will save the newFile as the new working version for the given identifier and data if the given file is new it will copy the permissions from the folder and if the file given is set to live = true it will publish it
        Specified by:
        getWorkingFileByFileName in interface FileFactory
        Parameters:
        newFile - New File to save
        data - New data to store
        folder - Parent folder to be assigned to the new file
        identifier - Identifier of the asset
        user - User how is making the modification if null no user id will be set as the last modified user
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        DotDataException
